"What are you up to, Bruder?"
"I'm just gathering some food supplies."

"I just happen to be walking
off the beaten path during a patrol mission."
"This place somewhat reminds me of the past."
"I see."
"I'm just stopping by during one of my patrol missions."
"This place somewhat reminds me of the past."

"I'm also a Meteorn, you know.
Just like you and Manon."
"This coast is where I landed."
"...Can't forget that day."

"Just having stepped outside of my pod with no
idea what was going on, there I stood."
"Next thing I know, I'm being surrounded by enemies."

"Somehow I already knew how to use the weapon in my hand,
but I was vastly outnumbered."
"Slowly but surely, the enemies started to overwhelm me."

"It looked like that's where it was going to end for me.
Before I even knew who I was..."
"When suddenly, a single ARKS appeared."

"This man started taking the enemies down one by one.
Bearing down on them like a flash of lightning."
"And that man... was Crawford."

"He hadn't yet become the Central Leader.
This was back when he was but a simple ARKS member."

"Apparently he had just happened to be in the area to see
my pod fall from the sky, and he came to recover me."

"He carried what was left of me back to the City
and had all of my damaged parts repaired."

"And then he welcomed me into
Central City as one of its citizens."

"After that, he taught me about
how to live here on Halpha."

"Including how to fight, of course.
Started me right from the basics."
"Crawford really saved your life, huh."
"Crawford taught you how to fight?"

"Aye. I owe him a debt that I doubt
I'll ever be able to repay."
"Aye. That perfectionist had quite the thorough curriculum."
"He was a strict teacher, too. The guidance I gave you and the girls was a trifle by comparison."
"I stand here today entirely thanks to Crawford."

"Now I work for him, as some small way
of repaying my debt to him."
"I'd also like you to support him as well."

"There aren't many people who know and support
the man behind all his charisma."
"I'd appreciate it if you did."
